name: Shella Harin

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: New RepublicNew Republic Intelligence ServiceSpecial Threats Division
New Republic Intelligence ServiceSpecial Threats Division

content: Shella Harin was a Human lieutenant in the New Republic Intelligence Service, specifically Special Threats Division. As an Intelligence agent, one of Harin's assignments was to compile a report on the planet Leria Kerlsil with the help of Professor Bin Binnari.
